Text:
Heehee. Finally, two wins in a row! I think I'm
getting the hang of this!

Damn it, Beta... You've got quite a lot of stamina!
My lord! One more round, please!

I'm in great condition right now, so I won't lose the
next round, either!

(...Well, it looks like they're both enjoying
themselves.)

(Thanks to having a competitor, they have the
sportsmanship attitude of "Again! One more round!"
even when losing. It makes me want to match their
passion.)

(Right now, I'm the epitome of a devoted coach! It's
my mission to stoke these young athletes' passion
and keep it burning!)

Hmm... Beta. You may be in the lead, but your average
time is increasing.

...Epsilon, your form is getting sloppy. Keep it up,
and you'll develop bad habits.

What? You noticed I switched up my center of
gravity to cover my fatigue? There really is no
deceiving you, my lord...

(I just spouted off something that sounded plausible.
That said, I have a good grasp of sports clichés.)

It's not good to push yourself too hard. Let's take a
break and continue from there.

(During the break, I gave some serious thought to how
I could get the girls even more fired up...)

(...The conclusion I reached is the classic carrot
and stick. A good coach provides motivation to
overcome tough training.)

(You know, the typical BBQ at the end of training
camp or treating them to a fancy meal. Those sorts of
tropes.)
I'll give a reward to whichever of you wins.
...Wait, that's not quite what I said...
Beta. Sorry, but I'm winning this match for sure.

...Right back at you, Epsilon. You'd better start
thinking about your concession speech.

Oh? But you're so much better at writing than I am.
I'd love to hear a concession speech written by the
famous novelist Natsume.

Hmm? Then how about turning the anguish of your
defeat into a song? In fact, why not a lullaby?
Coming from a famous singer like yourself, Shiron...
it ought to put me right to sleep.

(Whoa... That was pretty effective in getting them
fired up. I should also start thinking about how to
cheer up the loser.)

(What?! Both of them are off to a perfect start that
would put professionals to shame! They've seriously
mastered it in just a few rounds!)

(...Sorry, but the match is already decided. Victory
comes with consistent practice!)

(And I am the one who has come out on top up to this
point! The goddess of victory, no, Master Shadow
himself smiles upon me!)

(...After hearing Master Shadow's advice, my victory
was all but guaranteed. His words always save me.)

(What matters isn't what you're born with, but
knowing what you're capable of! I will live up
to...my lord's expectations!)

They're evenly matched! At this point, it's anyone's
game!
...Hold on. Did I put the flag over there?

The moment the two grab the flag, a monster appears
before their eyes. What they thought was the flag was,
in fact, its fin.
But where's the flag?! Where is it?!

I couldn't check properly because of the distance,
but it looks like it wasn't the flag!
The crime of depriving me of my reward is severe!

The two turn toward the monster with deadly glares
beyond anything they have displayed during their
missions.
